threeday.summary:
In Somerset, severe river flooding on the Somerset Levels will continue for at least the next three days where there is a HIGH overall flood risk.
River levels are now gradually falling on the River Thames, however, there are still significant flooding impacts along large stretches of the Thames where the overall flood risk is MEDIUM. This lowers to a LOW river flood risk from Sunday.
There is a LOW overall flood risk from coastal flooding over the next three days at Chiswell in Dorset, where beach defences have been degraded by recent storms.
On the River Severn in Worcestershire and Gloucestershire, river levels are gradually receding with minor impacts continuing today and on Saturday, then lowering to a VERY LOW risk from Sunday. In Kent, minor impacts are continuing on the River Stour today, giving a LOW flood risk overall. Impacts include flooding of some properties and agricultural land as well as travel disruption. Heavy rainfall is expected across northwest England and Wales on Sunday and Monday. There is a LOW overall flood risk in these areas with minor disruption from river and surface water flooding possible in these areas.
There is an ongoing risk from groundwater flooding in Hampshire, Wiltshire, Dorset, Kent and Greater London (Croydon area) for the next three days. Significant impacts are expected such as flooding to properties and roads, and travel disruption. There is a MEDIUM overall flood risk in these areas. There is also a risk of minor groundwater flooding for much of south-east and south-central England through the next three days, bringing a LOW overall flood risk.
This forecast is updated daily - please check again for the latest forecast. For local flood information please contact Floodline on 0345 9881188 or 0845 9881188.
threeday.summary_cymru: Yng Ngwlad yr Haf, bydd llifogydd afon difrifol ar Wastadeddau Gwlad yr Haf yn parhau am o leiaf y tri diwrnod nesaf, lle mae risg UCHEL o lifogydd. Mae lefel yr afon yn disgyn yn raddol ar yr Afon Tafwys ,beth bynnag, mae effeithiau llifogydd sylweddol ar hyd rhannau helaeth o'r Tafwys lle mae risg CANOLIG o lifogydd yn gyffredinol. Caiff y risg hyn ei leihau i risg ISEL o dydd Sul ymlaen. Mae risg ISEL o lifogydd arfordirol yn gyffredinol dros y tri diwrnod nesaf yn Chiswell yn Dorset, lle mae amddiffynfeydd traeth wedi cael eu diraddio gan stormydd diweddar. Ar yr Afon Hafren yn Swydd Gaerwrangon a Swydd Gaerloyw, mae lefelau afonydd yn cilio yn raddol gyda ychydig o effeithiau yn parhau heddiw ac dydd Sadwrn, ac yna gostwng i risg ISEL IAWN o dydd Sul ymlaen. Yng Nghaint byth rhai effeithiau yn parhau ar yr Afon Stour heddiw, gan roi perygl llifogydd ISEL yn gyffredinol. Mi fydd effeithiau llifogydd yn cynnwys amhariad i eiddo a thir amaethyddol yn ogystal â anhawster wrth deithio. Disgwylir glaw trwm ar draws gogledd-orllewin Lloegr a Chymru dydd Sul a dydd Llun . Mae perygl llifogydd yn ISEL yn yr ardaloedd hyn gyda mân aflonyddwch yn bosibl o ganlyniad i lifogydd o’r afon a llifogydd dwr wyneb. Mae risg o lifogydd dwr daear yn parhau yn Hampshire, Wiltshire, Dorset, Caint a Llundain Fwyaf (ardal Croydon ) dros y tri diwrnod nesaf. Disgwylir effeithiau sylweddol i eiddo a ffyrdd, a hynny'n amharu a’r deithio. Mae risg CANOLIG o lifogydd yn yr ardaloedd hyn . Mae yna hefyd risg o ychydig o lifogydd dwr daear ar gyfer llawer o dde-ddwyrain a de-ganolig Lloegr yn ystod y tri diwrnod nesaf, gan ddod â risg ISEL o lifogydd. Mae'r rhagolwg hwn yn cael ei ddiweddaru bob dydd - edrychwch eto ar gyfer y rhagolygon diweddaraf . I gael gwybodaeth llifogydd lleol, cysylltwch â Floodline ar 0345 9881188 neu 0845 9881188 .

risk.impact: Severe disruption. Widespread flooding of property. Severe disruption to travel. Loss of gas, electricity, water supplies. Significant disruption to communities. Evacuation expected.
risk.advice: Significant risk to life. Take action to protect yourself and follow the advice of the emergency services.

risk.impact: Significant disruption. Flooding of homes, businesses and transport links - disruption to travel. Disruption to gas, electricity, water supplies and telecoms. Evacuation may be required.
risk.advice: Flooding of property is expected. Take action to protect yourself and your property.

risk.impact: Minor disruption. Flooding of fields, recreational land and car parks. Flooding of a small number of homes and businesses. Wet road services and possibility of ponding water. Local disruption to travel - longer journey times.
risk.advice: Flooding of property is possible - be prepared. Stay vigilant. Water on roads - take care when driving.

risk.impact: Minimal disruption. Flooding of fields, recreational land and car parks. Some local disruption to travel. Wet road services and possibility of ponding water.
risk.advice: Flooding is possible - be prepared. Stay vigilant. Water on roads - take care when driving.
